headline.main: GM Will Lay Off 1,100 in Michigan After Domestic Production Shift
headline.print_headline: GM Will Lay Off 1,100 in Michigan After Domestic Production Shift

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co said on Monday it will lay off 1,100 workers in May at its Lansing Delta Township assembly plant in Michigan as it shifts production of a vehicle to Tennessee.
snippet: General Motors Co said on Monday it will lay off 1,100 workers in May at its Lansing Delta Township assembly plant in Michigan as it shifts production of a vehicle to Tennessee....
